rescuecore2.connection

Class AbstractConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.connection.AbstractConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamConnection

    public abstract class AbstractConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connection
    Abstract base class for Connection implementations.

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Find out if this connection is still alive. The connection is alive if it has been started, not stopped, and no fatal errors have occurred.
        Specified by:
        isAlive in interface Connection
        Returns:
        True if this connection is alive and is still able to send/receive messages, false otherwise.

      • startupImpl

        protected abstract void startupImpl()
        Perform startup actions. This will only ever be called once.

      • shutdownImpl

        protected abstract void shutdownImpl()
        Perform shutdown actions. This will only ever be called once.

      • bytesReceived

        protected void bytesReceived(byte[] b)
        Process some bytes that were received. The default implementation will use the Registry to decode all messages in the buffer and send them to listeners.
        Parameters:
        b - The received bytes.

      • fireMessageReceived

        protected void fireMessageReceived(Message m)
        Fire a messageReceived event to all registered listeners.
        Parameters:
        m - The message that was received.
